titles.title: Strategy to Reduce Russian Energy Influence Act of 2022
Strategy to Reduce Russian Energy Influence Act of 2022
A bill to require a strategy for international cooperation to counter Russian energy influence globally.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Strategy to Reduce Russian Energy Influence Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of State to report to Congress an evaluation of how federal laws and authorities can be used to counter Russia's energy influence globally. The report must include a strategy to reduce or replace Russia's supply of energy products in global markets.
